description:
Inspired by legendary wall routes that expose your hide to direct sun all day. This hoodie protects your neck, is breathable and looks good on big walls, boulders, hikes, or hanging in Camp 4.

  • Made of stretchy nylon and spandex that is quick-drying and wicking
  • 3-piece hood adds coverage and easily fits under a helmet
  • Low-Pro Binding™ Cuffs with thumb loops
  • Chest pocket with zipper closure for small essentials
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
name: Outdoor Research Astroman Sun Hoodie - Men's
